content: – Esterbrook White Pastel / Purse fountain pen– Stunning White color – also referred as Doctor’s Pen– Full set comes with original box and paper– First generation / series with black jewel ends– New Old Stock Never been inked before– “Educational Sample”– Fitted with #1555 shorthand nib Esterbrook Pastel white fountain pen – Up here is a vintage Esterbrook Pastels Purse fountain pen, which was manufactured in USA circa 1950s.The pen is a first generation series, with black jewels on both ends.This is a new old stock pen, never been inked before. It comes with its original paper gift box and paper.On the barrel is marked with ‘EDUCATIONAL SAMPLE’ showing that the pen is a sample in the past time.The pen is in nice stunning highly sought after white color, very glossy as new. It is also referred as Doctor’s pen.It is fitted with a stainless steel Esterbrook #1555 shorthand nib.The pen is in excellent new mint condition, without any fault or crackA new sac has been fitted. The lever filling system is special and in working order.This Esterbrook has a classic elegance and has been produced to the highest standards of craftsmanship, technology and aesthetics.The pen has been serviced and tested for full functionality. This is rare and very much sought after, of such a collectible and vintage pen in excellent condition.https://pastpens.com/shop/esterbrook-white-doctor-pastel-purse-pen-new/
